
# Function


## ```js wait ```


This function is a simple "setTimeout" wrapper inside a promise.

## Parameters

- **timeout**  Number: The timeout to wait in ms



## Example (js)

```js
import wait from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/time/wait';
await wait(2000);
```
